articles.title: Snap Acquires Music App Voisey - Somag News
articles.description: Snap Inc., which has recently started to give importance to music applications and initiatives in the sector, bought the music application Voisey. It is currently unknown how much the company paid for this acquisition or what its plans for Voisey are.
